title: In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [September 2010]
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner

abstract: Ten interviews with Victorian war veterans.
description: ACMI's Digital Storytelling unit interviewed ten Victorian war veterans for their perspectives on life in the army, being involved in war in a different country and adjusting to life back in Australia. The personal experiences of these soldiers provide a moving memoir and a compelling historical account of Australia in wartime.
